mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, CONTENT, REGDATE, PARENT_SEQ FROM FREE_COMMENTS WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{parent_seq} ORDER BY SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_COMMENTS (SEQ, ID, NAME, CONTENT, REGDATE, PARENT_SEQ) VALUES(FREE_COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{parent_seq})
mapper.delete: DELETE FREE_COMMENTS WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND ID = #{id}
